question: A couple of weeks after returning from Umrah a had a strange dream.
answer:
QUESTION
I saw myself sitting very far from the Kabaa,intending to perform my Salaah and finally succeeding in facing Qiblah(one of the corners of the Kabaa).There were about 6 rows of people performing Salaah around the Kabaa but their backs were all facing to the Kabaa. I commented on how strange and wrong this was.Can you tell me what this means? Jazakallah.
ANSWER


Share:
The dream is clear. Many Muslims in Islamic environments commit un-Islamic
acts. May Allah Ta'ala protect us.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
